episodes.content: Showcasing Japanese music to the world. Featuring live performances by some of Japan's leading J-POP singers and musicians.
episodes.description: Samurai guitarist MIYAVI, who has pumped up audiences all over the world with his dynamic and inimitable guitar performances, will be making his second appearance on the show.
episodes.subtitle: #15 MIYAVI
episodes.title: SONGS OF TOKYO

episodes.content: Showcasing Japanese music to the world. Featuring live performances by some of Japan's leading J-POP singers and musicians.
episodes.description: Ozaki Hiroya, his father is the late Ozaki Yutaka, a legendary singer and his hits are still popular across Asia.Ozaki Hiroya is carrying on his father's legacy by exploring new music styles.
episodes.subtitle: #16 Ozaki Hiroya
episodes.title: SONGS OF TOKYO

episodes.content: Showcasing Japanese music to the world. Featuring live performances by some of Japan's leading J-POP singers and musicians.
episodes.description: Meet JO1, the 11- member boys group that's rising to international fame! They've been making waves around the world ever since they clinched the award for Best New Asian Artist in MAMA.
episodes.subtitle: #17 JO1
episodes.title: SONGS OF TOKYO

episodes.content: Showcasing Japanese music to the world. Featuring live performances by some of Japan's leading J-POP singers and musicians.
episodes.description: "Winter Queen" Hirose Kohmi, a songstress who has released hit singles such as "My God blessed Romance" Now, she is in the spotlight for innovative cover songs on her YouTube channel.
episodes.subtitle: #18 Hirose Kohmi
episodes.title: SONGS OF TOKYO

episodes.content: Showcasing Japanese music to the world. Featuring live performances by some of Japan's leading J-POP singers and musicians.
episodes.description: Meet Sexy Zone celebrating their 10th anniversary! They will perform RUN, a sing about their bond, and RIGHT NEXT TO YOU, a new English song with dynamic dance moves.
episodes.subtitle: #19 Sexy Zone
episodes.title: SONGS OF TOKYO

episodes.content: Showcasing Japanese music to the world. Featuring live performances by some of Japan's leading J-POP singers and musicians.
episodes.description: Feat ring school idol groups from the Love Live! series, Thirteen representative members from Aqours, Liella! and Nijigasaki High School Idol Club will make their first TV appearance together.
episodes.subtitle: #20 Love Live! Series SP
episodes.title: SONGS OF TOKYO

episodes.content: Showcasing Japanese music to the world. Featuring live performances by some of Japan's leading J-POP singers and musicians.
episodes.description: Sakurazaka 46 performs three of their latest singles, each with a different member taking the center position. Tune in to see for yourself how they have evolved five years since formation.
episodes.subtitle: #21 Sakurazaka46
episodes.title: SONGS OF TOKYO
